verses.verse: "And <S%H6258>now,<s%> O <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H8085>listen<s%> to the <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and the <S%H4941>judgments<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I am <S%H3925>teaching<s%> you to <S%H6213>perform,<s%> in <S%H4616>order<s%> that you may <S%H2421>live<s%> and <S%H935>go<s%> in and <S%H3423>take<s%> <S%H3423>possession<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of your fathers, is <S%H1>giving<s%> you.

"You shall not <S%H3254>add<s%> to the <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I am <S%H6680>commanding<s%> you, <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H1639>take<s%> <S%H1639>away<s%> from it, that you may <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6680>command<s%> you.

"Your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H853>what<s%> <S%H834><s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H6213>done<s%> in the case of Baal-peor, for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H1980>followed<s%> <S%H310><s%> Baal-peor, the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> them from <S%H7130>among<s%> you.
"But you who <S%H1695>held<s%> <S%H1695>fast<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> are <S%H2416>alive<s%> <S%H3117>today,<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H3605>one<s%> of you.

<S%H7200>"See,<s%> I have <S%H3925>taught<s%> you <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and <S%H4941>judgments<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> my <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> me, that you should <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3651>thus<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> you are <S%H935>entering<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it.

"So <S%H8104>keep<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> [them], for that is your <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and your <S%H998>understanding<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> will <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H7534>'Surely<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%> is a <S%H2450>wise<s%> and <S%H995>understanding<s%> <S%H5971>people.<s%>'

"For <S%H4310>what<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%> is there that has a <S%H430>god<s%> so <S%H7138>near<s%> to it as is the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3605>whenever<s%> we <S%H7121>call<s%> on Him?

"Or <S%H4310>what<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%> is there that has <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and <S%H4941>judgments<s%> as <S%H6662>righteous<s%> as <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H8451>law<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I am <S%H5414>setting<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you <S%H3117>today<s%>?

<S%H7534>"Only<s%> <S%H8104>give<s%> <S%H8104>heed<s%> to yourself and <S%H8104>keep<s%> your <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H3966>diligently,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> you <S%H7911>forget<s%> the <S%H1697>things<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> have <S%H7200>seen,<s%> and <S%H6435>lest<s%> they <S%H5493>depart<s%> from your <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H9132>life;<s%> but <S%H3045>make<s%> them <S%H3045>known<s%> to your <S%H1121>sons<s%> and your <S%H1121>grandsons.<s%>

"[Remember] the <S%H3117>day<s%> you <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> at <S%H2722>Horeb,<s%> when the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H6950>'Assemble<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> to Me, that I may let them <S%H8085>hear<s%> My <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H834>so<s%> they may <S%H3925>learn<s%> to <S%H3372>fear<s%> Me <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> they <S%H2416>live<s%> on the <S%H127>earth,<s%> and that they may <S%H3925>teach<s%> their <S%H1121>children.<s%>'

"And you <S%H7126>came<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> at the <S%H8478>foot<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> and the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H1197>burned<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%> to the [very] <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H8064>heavens:<s%> <S%H2822>darkness,<s%> <S%H6051>cloud<s%> and <S%H6205>thick<s%> <S%H6205>gloom.<s%>

"Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to you from the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H784>fire;<s%> you <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of <S%H1697>words,<s%> but you <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H8544>form<s%> â€“ <S%H2108>only<s%> a <S%H6963>voice.<s%>

"So He <S%H5046>declared<s%> to you His <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> He <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you to <S%H6213>perform,<s%> [that is,] the <S%H6235>Ten<s%> <S%H1697>Commandments;<s%> and He <S%H3789>wrote<s%> them on <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tablets<s%> of <S%H68>stone.<s%>

"And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> me at that <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H3925>teach<s%> you <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> that you might <S%H6213>perform<s%> them in the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> you are <S%H5674>going<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it.

"So <S%H8104>watch<s%> <S%H5315>yourselves<s%> <S%H3966>carefully,<s%> <S%H3588>since<s%> you did not <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H8544>form<s%> on the <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to you at <S%H2722>Horeb<s%> from the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H784>fire,<s%>

<S%H6435>lest<s%> you <S%H7843>act<s%> <S%H7843>corruptly<s%> and <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H6459>graven<s%> <S%H6459>image<s%> for yourselves in the <S%H8544>form<s%> of <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H5566>figure,<s%> the <S%H8403>likeness<s%> of <S%H2145>male<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H5347>female,<s%>

the <S%H8403>likeness<s%> of <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H929>animal<s%> that is on the <S%H776>earth,<s%> the <S%H8403>likeness<s%> of <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H3671>winged<s%> <S%H6833>bird<s%> that <S%H5774>flies<s%> in the <S%H8064>sky,<s%>

the <S%H8403>likeness<s%> of <S%H3605>anything<s%> that <S%H7430>creeps<s%> on the <S%H127>ground,<s%> the <S%H8403>likeness<s%> of <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H1710>fish<s%> that is in the <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H4480>below<s%> <S%H8478><s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

"And [beware,] <S%H6435>lest<s%> you <S%H5375>lift<s%> up your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> to <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H8121>sun<s%> and the <S%H3394>moon<s%> and the <S%H3556>stars,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6635>host<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and be <S%H5080>drawn<s%> <S%H5080>away<s%> and <S%H7812>worship<s%> them and <S%H5647>serve<s%> them, those <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H2505>allotted<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H8064>heaven.<s%>

"But the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H3947>taken<s%> you and <S%H3318>brought<s%> you out of the <S%H1270>iron<s%> <S%H3564>furnace,<s%> from <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> to be a <S%H5971>people<s%> for His own <S%H5159>possession,<s%> as <S%H3117>today.<s%>

"Now the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> was <S%H599>angry<s%> with me on your <S%H5921>account,<s%> <S%H1697><s%> and <S%H7650>swore<s%> that I should not <S%H5674>cross<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> and that I should not <S%H935>enter<s%> the <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H5414>giving<s%> you as an <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>

"For I shall <S%H4191>die<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> I shall not <S%H5674>cross<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> but you shall <S%H5674>cross<s%> and <S%H3423>take<s%> <S%H3423>possession<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land.<s%>

"So <S%H8104>watch<s%> yourselves, <S%H6435>lest<s%> you <S%H7911>forget<s%> the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> He <S%H3772>made<s%> with you, and <S%H6213>make<s%> for yourselves a <S%H6459>graven<s%> <S%H6459>image<s%> in the <S%H8544>form<s%> of <S%H3605>anything<s%> [against] <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you.
"For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> is a <S%H398>consuming<s%> <S%H784>fire,<s%> a <S%H7067>jealous<s%> <S%H410>God.<s%>

<S%H3588>"When<s%> you <S%H3205>become<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H1121>children<s%> and <S%H1121>children<s%>'s children and have <S%H3462>remained<s%> <S%H3462>long<s%> in the <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H7843>act<s%> <S%H7843>corruptly,<s%> and <S%H6213>make<s%> an <S%H6459>idol<s%> in the <S%H8544>form<s%> of <S%H3605>anything,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> that <S%H7451>which<s%> is <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> [so as] to <S%H3707>provoke<s%> Him to <S%H3707>anger,<s%>

I <S%H5749>call<s%> <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H776>earth<s%> to <S%H5749>witness<s%> against you <S%H3117>today,<s%> that you shall surely perish <S%H6>quickly<s%> from the <S%H6>land<s%> <S%H4118>where<s%> <S%H776><s%> you are <S%H834>going<s%> <S%H8033>over<s%> the <S%H5674>Jordan<s%> to <S%H5674>possess<s%> it. You shall not <S%H3383>live<s%> <S%H3423>long<s%> <S%H748><s%> on it, but shall be <S%H748>utterly<s%> <S%H3117>destroyed.<s%>

"And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H6327>scatter<s%> you among the <S%H5971>peoples,<s%> and you shall be <S%H7604>left<s%> <S%H4962>few<s%> in <S%H4557>number<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall <S%H5090>drive<s%> you.

"And <S%H8033>there<s%> you will <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of man's <S%H3027>hands,<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%> and <S%H68>stone,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H9552>smell.<s%>

"But from <S%H8033>there<s%> you will <S%H1245>seek<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and you will <S%H4672>find<s%> [Him] <S%H3588>if<s%> you <S%H1875>search<s%> for Him with <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H3824>heart<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H5315>soul.<s%>

"When you are in <S%H9496>distress<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>things<s%> have <S%H4672>come<s%> upon you, in the <S%H319>latter<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> you will <S%H7725>return<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> and <S%H8085>listen<s%> to His <S%H6963>voice.<s%>

"For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> is a <S%H7349>compassionate<s%> <S%H410>God;<s%> He will not <S%H7503>fail<s%> you <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H7843>destroy<s%> you <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H7911>forget<s%> the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with your fathers <S%H1>which<s%> He <S%H834>swore<s%> to them.

<S%H3588>"Indeed,<s%> <S%H7592>ask<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> concerning the <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were <S%H6440>before<s%> you, <S%H4480>since<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> that <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1254>created<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> on the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and [inquire] from one <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> to the <S%H7097>other.<s%> <S%H8064><s%> Has [anything] <S%H1961>been<s%> <S%H1961>done<s%> like <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1697>thing,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> has [anything] been <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H3644>like<s%> it?

"Has [any] <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1696>speaking<s%> from the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H784>fire,<s%> as you have <S%H8085>heard<s%> [it], and <S%H2421>survived<s%>?

<S%H176>"Or<s%> has a <S%H430>god<s%> <S%H5254>tried<s%> to <S%H935>go<s%> to <S%H3947>take<s%> for himself a <S%H1471>nation<s%> from <S%H7130>within<s%> [another] <S%H1471>nation<s%> by <S%H4531>trials,<s%> by <S%H226>signs<s%> and <S%H4159>wonders<s%> and by <S%H4421>war<s%> and by a <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> and by an <S%H5186>outstretched<s%> <S%H2220>arm<s%> and by <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4172>terrors,<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> for you in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> before your <S%H5869>eyes<s%>?

"To you it was <S%H7200>shown<s%> that you might <S%H3045>know<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> He is <S%H430>God;<s%> <S%H369>there<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H5750>other<s%> <S%H4480>besides<s%> <S%H905><s%> Him.

"Out of the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> He let you <S%H8085>hear<s%> His <S%H6963>voice<s%> to <S%H3256>discipline<s%> you; and on <S%H776>earth<s%> He let you <S%H7200>see<s%> His <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H784>fire,<s%> and you <S%H8085>heard<s%> His <S%H1697>words<s%> from the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H784>fire.<s%>

<S%H8478>"Because<s%> <S%H3588><s%> He <S%H157>loved<s%> your fathers, therefore He <S%H1>chose<s%> their <S%H977>descendants<s%> <S%H2233>after<s%> them. And He <S%H310>personally<s%> <S%H6440>brought<s%> you from <S%H3318>Egypt<s%> by His <S%H4714>great<s%> <S%H1419>power,<s%>

<S%H3423>driving<s%> out from <S%H6440>before<s%> you <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H1419>greater<s%> and <S%H6099>mightier<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> you, to <S%H935>bring<s%> you in [and] to <S%H5414>give<s%> you their <S%H776>land<s%> for an <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> as it is <S%H3117>today.<s%>

<S%H3045>"Know<s%> therefore <S%H3117>today,<s%> and <S%H7725>take<s%> it to your <S%H3824>heart,<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> He is <S%H430>God<s%> in <S%H8064>heaven<s%> <S%H4480>above<s%> <S%H4605><s%> and on the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H4480>below<s%><S%H8478>;<s%> <S%H369>there<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H5750>other.<s%>

"So you shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> His <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and His <S%H4687>commandments<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I am <S%H6680>giving<s%> you <S%H3117>today,<s%> that it may <S%H3190>go<s%> <S%H3190>well<s%> with you and with your <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> you, and that you may <S%H748>live<s%> <S%H748>long<s%> <S%H3117><s%> on the <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H5414>giving<s%> you for <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3117>time.<s%>"
<S%H227>Then<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H914>set<s%> <S%H914>apart<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H5676>across<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> to the <S%H4217>east,<s%> <S%H8121><s%>
